Given a set of non-negative integers, and a value sum, determine if there is a subset of the given set with sum equal to given target sum.
Example:

Input:  set[] = {3, 34, 4, 12, 5, 2}, sum = 9
Output:  True  //There is a subset (4, 5) with sum 9.

Reference: https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/subset-sum-problem-dp-25/
